healthy: Today, it's a great day to head out to play!!! Let the kiddos run...Let it go!... It's good, what are you waiting for..!!
It's finally green!!! Time to play. Exercise. Breath in the fresh air.
There is no such thing as bad weather, only different kinds of good weather.
moderate: Time to start powering up on those vitamins and take exercise slowly
Let's hope a better day comes. It ain't too bad so far.. Chill
unhealthy: Cut down on all outdoor activities. Start having home activities with your kids
The fridge needs clearing. Don't bother heading out to eat. Cookin.
very-unhealthy: It's getting bad...Wearing a mask is a MUST
It's a great time to start ordering stuff at home. Or maybe start going on a holiday. Run away.
hazardous: HIDE! In anyway possible. Hide in the house. Cook from home. No kids outside
RUN! Get your passport and run away as far as you can.. Seriously.
